text: Sonderhof is a locality in the municipality Schmallenberg in the district Hochsauerlandkreis in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. The hamlet has 7 inhabitantsSchmallenberg.de: Inhabitants and lies in the north of the municipality of Schmallenberg at a height of around 590 m. Sonderhof borders on the villages of Osterwald and Rimberg. ==References== Category:Villages in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Schmallenberg
title: Sonderhof
